nodes.text: Roon Tours was a travel agency that gave wealthy, bitter tourists a thrill by taking them to out of the way, harsh planets, such as those in the Outer Rim Territories. The company was based on the planet Roon.

There was a Roon Tours tourist center on Tatooine, in Mos Eisley. A cruiser from this center was landing as Luke Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, R2-D2, and C-3PO came into Mos Eisley to gain passage offworld.
